data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 43,809 believers in the state of Limburg.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Limburg, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Limburg prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 43,809 believers in Limburg to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Limburg, Netherlands. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, I pray that the Tigre, Eritrean people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 43,809 believers living in the state of Limburg. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Limburg, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Limburg, Netherlands need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Limburg
location.people_groups_list: Kurd, Kurmanji, Tamil (Hindu traditions), Persian, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking, Jew, Dutch
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kurd, Kurmanji (75,000), Tamil (Hindu traditions) (20,000), Persian (4,500), Moroccan, Arabic-speaking (46,000), Jew, Dutch (30,000)
